item.title: [Python] I tried to analyze the hearing survey results with text mining
item.description: #Background It seems that you conducted an interview with a resident in a certain area in a study by a certain university at a certain university, but there was something unconsciously aware of the people in that area based on the content of the hearing. I decided to try it because I wanted to analyze it. Used MeCab This is also a familiar morphological analysis engine. What is morphological analysis?
